thread.title: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay
thread.title_full: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay

title: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay
text: Court sides with Uber drivers to expand case over pay Wednesday, 2 September 2015 (9 minutes ago) A federal judge granted class-action status to a lawsuit in California against Uber over the payment of its drivers, upping the stakes for the ride-hailing company in the case. U.S. Judge Gives Uber Drivers Class Action Status 00:55 A U.S. judge said on Tuesday Uber drivers are entitled to class action status in litigation over whether they are independent contractors or employees, part of a case that could have wide implications for the sharing economy. The lawsuit focuses on whether Uber's arrangement with drivers in...
